dcterms:description: GasHisSDB is a database containing 245,196 images of gastric cancer pathology, categorized into normal and abnormal images, with three sub-databases of different sizes (160x160, 120x120, and 80x80 pixels). It is used for comparing the performance of various machine learning and deep learning classifiers.
dcterms:title: GasHisSDB
